com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.controller

Class ExternalEntityNetworkController<T extends CommonEntity<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.entity.CommonEntityController<T>
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.controller.EntityNetworkController<T>
        • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.controller.ExternalEntityNetworkController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - type of Common Entity
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable

    public class ExternalEntityNetworkController<T extends CommonEntity<?>>
extends EntityNetworkController<T>
    A type of Entity Network Controller that was created externally, not by BKCommonLib. This is the case for plugins that replace the EntityTrackerEntry.
